summary:
My first Mod for Skyrim, Replaces the old Main Theme with charlieparradelriego Music versions.
Skyrim_The_Dragonborn_Comes and Skyrim_Main_theme_w_Black Sabbath.
descriptionHtml:
Charlie Parra del Riego playing his metal cover version of Skyrim\'s The Dragonborn comes.
Link
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gWPJ-AxU6X0&feature=relmfu

Charlie Parra del Riego playing his metal cover version of Skyrim theme plus a riff from Black Sabbath\'s Symptom of the Universe.
Link
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OZ_zt2j0N9E&feature=relmfu

And

Charlie Parra del Riego playing his metal version of Game of Thrones, composed by Ramin Djawadi.
Link
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MUsYMiVkFVE&feature=relmfu

------------------------------------------------------------------------

All credit goes to charlieparradelriego, the performer of this piece, and Bethesda.

Bethesda...
http://www.bethsoft.com/

charlieparradelriego

http://charlieparradelriego.com/

The Music is for Free on his Page Enjoy!!

Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/charlieparradelriego

Twitter: 
http://www.twitter.com/charlieparra
http://www.twitter.com/CharliePDRArmy


------------------------------------------------------------------------

To install, drag and drop the decompressed \"Music\" folder into your
Skyrim\'s \"Data\" folder.

Commonly \"..\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\\"

To uninstall, delete the file.


BTW THX charlieparradelriego I love you\'re music. \\m/
author: Shotman84
